mapper.insert: insert into orders (table_number, status, total_amount, payment_status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{tableNumber}, #{status}, #{totalAmount}, #{paymentStatus}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
insert into order_details (order_id, item_id, quantity, price, remark, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{itemId}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
